summary: Provides test utilities and case definitions for validating how unstructured grid data is partitioned and how discharge results are handled in MODFLOW 6 simulations, including helpers for array splitting, domain identification, coordinate precision reduction, and temporary file I/O.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable processing of unstructured groundwater model partitions and discharge calculations within the MODFLOW 6 workflow, supporting quality assurance and regression testing for the modeling platform.
